dead_outsider_J1: This isn't what I expected from the afterlife. Was this what you were hoping for?
dead_outsider_J2: I don't know why you can see me. It kind of freaks me out.
dead_outsider_J3: I don't think it's fair that I'm over here, and you're not.
Maybe there's some way I could sneak you in..?
No, no, I couldn't do that. If I do, they might kick me out...
dead_outsider_J4: Clans are cruel. This wouldn't be happening to you if you just left.
dead_outsider_J5: [You can't tell if being able to see {PRONOUN/t_c/object} as a ghost makes you more happy or sad.]
[{PRONOUN/t_c/poss/CAP} pelt is translucent, lacking any colour or feeling...]
[You miss the living t_c. So, so much.]
dead_outsider_J6: I'm sorry for your loss, y_c.
Clanmates... They really care for each other, don't they?
dead_outsider_J7: How awful must I have been, to end up in the hell for a belief that I didn't even hold?
Guess I'd better start learning some of this 'Clan' stuff. Hey, wanna teach me?
dead_outsider_J8: Do you Ascended slugcats think this is funny? You enjoy sending helpless slugcats to purgatory forever, even when they're not from a Clan?
I don't belong here. I've seen the ghosts that wander the living world. I'm supposed to be one of them.
dead_outsider_J9: Wanna swap places? I'll be a ghost, and you can join your Clan's afterlife. It's not fair for either of to be where we are, anyhow.
What? It's only fair! Come on!
dead_outsider_J11: How did you get over here? Is there an open spot at the border? Can you show me?
dead_outsider_J13: An outsider and a pup in the Rot Wound.
I think these 'Ascended' slugcats need to take a good look at who it really is they're sending to purgatory.
dead_outsider_J16: [You turn your head when you hear a small yelp. t_c is slowly floating towards you, nearly a tail-length off of the ground. {PRONOUN/t_c/poss/CAP} paws are swinging wildly in the air as {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/try/tries} to ground {PRONOUN/t_c/self}.]
[Though you weren't sure it would, {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} ghostly pelt reacts to your touch and you're able to gently push {PRONOUN/t_c/object} back onto the ground.]

It was kind of fun, though... I'm gonna try again.

dead_urourside_c2: I've never been able to see this area when I was alive. Those Clan slugcats always chased me away before I could take a closer look.

alive_urourside_c: I've always wondered how Clans worked. Can you tell me more about them?

[You toddle away first when a queen spots you.]

[t_c toddles off, unaware of the existential thoughts going through your head because of {PRONOUN/t_c/object}.]

[You pick up t_c and help {PRONOUN/t_c/object} tag along for the game. You don't win, but {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} seemed to have had lots of fun, and that makes it worth it!]
